welcome.title: Welcome to ArisanBae !
welcome.description: Applications to help those of you who are complicated to take notes about social gathering. Create a member and do the lottery anywhere.
welcome.choose_lang_description: What language do you want to use

create_profile_admin.title: Create a New Arisan
create_profile_admin.description: Complete your arisan data below, OK.
create_profile_admin.error_input_one: Enter the name of the gathering
create_profile_admin.error_input_five: Enter the number of people participating
create_profile_admin.error_input_six: Unable to calculate the winner, please enter the correct winner

entry_member.title: Member Content
entry_member.description: Please fill in the member according to the number of members that have been determined at the beginning.

create_pin_admin.title: Create Pin
create_pin_admin.description: Create a pin to enter into the application later.

confirm.title: Do you want to draw the winner of this social gathering

history.title: History
history.description: Here's the activity history in the app.
history.has_exported: Social gathering data has been exported

setting.title: Setting
setting.export_text: Export application data, take care if the application is deleted
setting.logout_text: This action will delete all social gathering data, please export the data before exiting.

with_import.title: Arisan Import - ArisanBae
with_import.box_import_text: Drag and drop the exported files here
with_import.stats_description: The following are data import statistics

snackbar_install.install_description: Installing uses almost no storage and provides a quick way to return to this app
snackbar_install.success_install: The application is installed successfully or the instructions for installing are displayed
